JobFullDesc: The browser is the most important tool for enterprise users so we are building the world's best browser for Enterprise. Under the hood, Microsoft Edge uses the same Chromium engine that works with sites around the world but Edge also keeps users safer and helps them be more productive. We’re looking for a Program Manager to plan and deliver the must-have features that take enterprise user productivity to a whole new level. As an Edge Program Manager, you’ll listen and learn from our customers. You will strive to improve our product, identify new opportunities, and plan features. You will use telemetry to analyze usage and feedback and to ensure product quality. You are a strong collaborator, able to effectively work with teams around the world. You’ll partner with developers, designers, marketing, and user researchers to plan, build, and ship features that will delight and grow our customer base.ResponsibilitiesUnderstand customer goals, unmet needs, and customer pains points through product telemetry, customer feedback and user research.Work with partners to define the vision for a feature and develop concepts and proposals.Author specs and partner with the engineering team to build and deliver complete and polished product experiences.Use customer feedback and product telemetry to validate features before shipping.Drive alignment across teams, assess & mitigate risks, and set priorities.QualificationsRequired Qualifications:BS/BA degree in Computer Science or a related field.3 years of Program/Project Management or related experience.Great communication skills, both written and verbal, with an ability to convey an appropriate level of detail for each target audience. English proficiency required.Previous experience developing apps or features on mobile platforms is preferred. An understanding of common mobile OS features and UI patterns is required.The ability to coordinate effectively in a multi-team environment.Must be detail-oriented, highly organized, and self-directed.Great time-management skills with the ability to handle fluctuating priorities and projectsPreferred Qualifications:Experience delivering or passion for using productivity and enterprise experiencesAbility to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.
